Dear ##SM_RULE_360 Email Salutation##,

Election season isn't quite over yet. As a current member of the ACLU of Oregon, you are eligible to vote for who will join or remain on our board of directors for a three-year term starting in January 2019.

These six great nominees each offer their own unique experiences and perspectives that will be invaluable to guiding the ACLU of Oregon into the future. Your voice is important and we encourage you to click here to vote.

You will need your ACLU membership number to vote.

##SM_RULE_360 Email Salutation##: ##account_number##

Cast your vote today!

If you have any questions or would prefer to receive a paper ballot, contact us at info@aclu-or.org. Electronic and paper ballots must be received no later than 5 p.m. on Monday, December 3.

Thank you for your support!

Jann Carson
Deputy Director, ACLU of Oregon
